org.openintents.tools.simulator.model.sensor

类 SensorSimulatorModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openintents.tools.simulator.model.sensor.SensorSimulatorModel

  • public class SensorSimulatorModel
extends java.lang.Object
    SensorSimulatorModel keeps the internal data model behind SensorSimulator. SensorSimulator simulates various sensors. An Android application can connect through TCP/IP with the settings shown to the SensorSimulator to simulate accelerometer, compass, orientation sensor, and thermometer.
    作者:
    Peli, Josip Balic
